item.description:
Light Life Massage


Chair Massage at the Larches. An afternoon of massage for the newcomer or for the veteran. Come feel the touch of Joanne, experience her approch to this wonderful art of relaxation . Join us for an afternoon of massage, tea and conversation. I will be offering 15 minute sessions at no cost. Chair Massage is done in a specially designed massage chair, no need to disrobe, yet the benifiets of a massage is no less. In 15 minutes you will feel refreshed, relaxed & rejuvinated. I will also be booking future 75 minute appointments.

See you there !!


Donations for this event will be accepted.
item.name: Light Life Massage with Joanne
